contest-event.event-date: Oct. 5, 1963 D National Mineworkers (Third Section) National Mineworkers (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-third-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003.
